1.0.0.name: wordpress/genesis2-html5
1.0.0.description:
Activate Genesis 2.0′s support for HTML5 and schema.org markup without having to edit the child theme's functions.php file. WordPress 3.6+ and Genesis 2.0+ is required to use this plugin. If your configuration doesn't meet the minimum requirements, the plugin will not be activated.

**NOTE: Your website's layout will be broken until you update your CSS and possibly your custom PHP code!
